text: If more of us valued food and cheer and song above hoarded gold, it would be a merrier world.

verses: 5 Have this mind among yourselves, which is yours in Christ Jesus,
6 who, though he was in the form of God, did not count equality with God a thing to be grasped,
7 but emptied himself, by taking the form of a servant,[c] being born in the likeness of men.
8 And being found in human form, he humbled himself by becoming obedient to the point of death, even death on a cross.

blog.title: Why I Code and Write
blog.summary: On the surface, writing and coding seem totally different. But for me, they're two sides of the same creative spark.
